roleset.name: to denote, mean or make known

example.name: transitive
example.text: Uptick -- An expression signifying that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previous transaction in that security .
example.arg: that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previous transaction in that security

example.name: transitive with agent
example.text: `` He does n't signify what people want, so the unrest will go on , '' Mr. Oldenburg predicts .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'signify' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
